snippet: Michael Egan, the accuser in a series of suits, has dropped his complaint against David Neuman, a former Disney television executive.
lead_paragraph: Michael Egan, the accuser in a series of suits, has dropped his complaint against David Neuman, a former Disney television executive.

headline.seo: Michael Egan Withdraws His Complaint Against David Neuman, an Ex-Disney Executive
headline.main: A Hollywood Sexual-Abuse Suit Is Dropped
